page.title: 18Doniford Holiday Village
page.content: {Doniford Holiday Village,}which was fairly recently converted from an {Army Barracks}is now a very attractive area with much to offer the tourist. It has 150{self catering chalets } and a further 63 self catering caravans. In addition there is room for 150{touring caravans and tents. } The facilities offered include a large {ballroom with nightly entertainment. } There is a private bar to enable people to have a quiet drink while their children are being looked after by the{childrens entertainer}in a separate room. For the more active there are facilities for{Badminton, Table {Tennis, Snooker etc.} Outside visitors an use the tennis courts and on the ground that was the parade ground there are now{hockey and {netball pitches. }
